Package com.piggybox.bags

User Defined Functions for processing data bags.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BagBinNumeric Given a bag of tuples whose first field is numeric (i.e.
CountEachBy Generate the number of occurrence times of each tuple in a bag regarding to specific field.
JoinEachBy Given a bag, return a new bag of one-field tuples which are joint by @sep.
MergeTuples Merge all tuples in a bag into an single new tuple.
NthTupleFromBag Returns the Nth (indexing from zero) tuple from a bag.
SumEachBy Generate the sum of a value field with respect to a key field in a bag of tuples.
